channel.title: admin on Tri V Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Tri V Nguyen

item.description: I’m a Physics PhD student at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. My primary research interests are gravitational waves and multimessenger astronomy, including but not limited to: Detect and characterize GW sources Electromagnetic follow-up of GW sources Understand GW detectors At MIT, I work with Dr. Erik Katsavounidis and Prof. Salvatore Vitale at the LIGO Data Analysis group. As a member of the LIGO collaboration, I’ve also worked with Dr.
